duid-type.__description: Selects the format for the DUID.

duid-llt-hardware-type.__helperText: Hardware type as assigned by IANA (RFC826)

duid-llt-link-layer-addr.__helperText: MAC address as described in RFC2464

duid-en-enterprise-number.__helperText: Vendor's registered Private Enterprise Number as maintained by IANA

duid-en-identifier.__helperText: Identifier, unique to the device that is using it

duid-ll-hardware-type.__helperText: Hardware type as assigned by IANA (RFC826).

duid-ll-link-layer-addr.__helperText: Link-layer address as described in RFC2464

uuid.__helperText: A Universally Unique Identifier in the string format defined in RFC 4122. Lowercase characters recommended.

data.__helperText: A Universally Unique Identifier in the string format defined in RFC 4122. Lowercase characters recommended.

duid-type.__description: Selects the format for the DUID.

duid-llt-hardware-type.__helperText: Hardware type as assigned by IANA (RFC826)

duid-llt-link-layer-addr.__helperText: MAC address as described in RFC2464

duid-en-enterprise-number.__helperText: Vendor's registered Private Enterprise Number as maintained by IANA

duid-en-identifier.__helperText: Identifier, unique to the device that is using it

duid-ll-hardware-type.__helperText: Hardware type as assigned by IANA (RFC826).

duid-ll-link-layer-addr.__helperText: Link-layer address as described in RFC2464

uuid.__helperText: A Universally Unique Identifier in the string format defined in RFC 4122. Lowercase characters recommended.

data.__helperText: A Universally Unique Identifier in the string format defined in RFC 4122. Lowercase characters recommended.

over-current-supported.__helperText: Set to TRUE when the equipment supports over-current notifications

name.__helperText: Unique port name, 1-255 characters (alphanumeric or underscore)

dc-control-support.__helperText: Indicates if DC on/off control is supported

dc-enabled-status.__helperText: Status of DC voltage (effective only if dc-control-support = true)

supported-connector.__helperText: Connector type associated with ALD port

name.__helperText: Must match an existing ald-port name

dc-enabled.__helperText: Set to true to enable DC power (only if dc-control-support = true)

aging-time.__helperText: Timeout period for ageing out dynamically-learned forwarding info (10-10,000,000 seconds)

name.__helperText: Must reference existing output port name

status.__helperText: Current validation status of the software slot

active.__helperText: Indicates if software is currently activated

running.__helperText: Indicates if software is currently in use

vendor-code.__helperText: Vendor identifier code (1-2 chars or 1-5 digit IANA PEN)

build-version.__helperText: Version string of the software build

two-step-flag.__helperText: Status of twoStepFlag in Sync messages

id.__helperText: Order of entry in the list (lower numbers first)

map-type.__helperText: Algorithm to map certificate to name

configured-cu-monitoring-interval.__helperText: CU plane monitoring interval in milliseconds (0 disables monitoring)

heartbeat-interval.__helperText: Heartbeat interval in seconds for event collectors

heartbeat-recipient-id.__helperText: List of event collector identifiers (IP addresses or URIs)

odu-id.__helperText: O-DU identifier for single operator environment

users.__constraint: At least one user must be enabled

password.__helperText: Password requiring 2+ chars from: lowercase, uppercase, numbers, specials !$%^()[]_-~{}.+

enabled.__helperText: Account activation status (password required if PASSWORD type)

sro-id.__helperText: Shared Resource Operator IDs for enhanced access

tcv2.__helperText: Compensation value for R2 to timestamping delay

tcv1.__helperText: Compensation value for processing time to R3 transmission

enable-message5.__helperText: Whether O-RU's eCPRI message 5 handling is enabled

processing-element-name.__helperText: Name of processing element used for MSG5

transport-session-type.__helperText: Transport session type for multi-PE configurations

id.__helperText: Unique identifier of a Maintenance Domain
Unique identifier of a Maintenance Association

measurement-object.__helperText: Reference to RX window measurement objects
Reference to TX stats measurement objects

component-class.__helperText: Supported hardware component classes for EPE measurements

measurement-object.__helperText: Reference to symbol RSSI measurement objects

enable-SFTP-upload.__helperText: Flag to enable upload of performance measurement result files. (Deprecated)

enable-file-upload.__helperText: Flag to enable file uploads over SFTP/FTPES based on path format. Supersedes enable-SFTP-upload.

enable-random-file-upload.__helperText: Enable random file uploads within file-upload-interval

credential-information.__helperText: Type of authentication for file transfer

remote-file-uploads.__helperText: File upload to multiple servers (replaces deprecated remote-SFTP-uploads)

remote-file-upload-path.__helperText: URI format: sftp://<user>@<host>[:port]/path or ftpes://<user>@<host>[:port]/path (Note: ftpes is not IANA registered)

credential-information.__helperText: Type of authentication for file transfer

max-bin-count.__helperText: Maximum configurable bin count for frequency tables (read-only)

object-unit.__helperText: Unit to measure performance per object-id. PORT_NUMBER: Measurement per port identifier

function.__helperText: Value representation: RAW (real value), LOG_10 (base 10 logarithm)

bin-count.__helperText: Number of frequency table bins (must be < max-bin-count)

lower-bound.__helperText: Lower value of first frequency table bin

upper-bound.__helperText: Upper value of first frequency table bin

object-unit-id.__helperText: Port number reference for measurement results

value.__helperText: Count of measurements in this bin

tx-measurement-objects.__helperText: TX measurement configuration for O-RAN WG4 functions

measurement-object.__helperText: CU-plane transmission counters: TX_TOTAL(all packets), TX_TOTAL_C(control packets)

count.__helperText: TX packet count for RU measurements
TX packet count for transport measurements
TX packet count for EAXC measurements

object-unit-id.__helperText: Hardware component class reference (e.g., or-hw:O-RAN-RADIO, ianahw:power-supply)

symbol-rssi-measurement-objects.__helperText: Symbol-wise TD-RSSI measurement configuration and reporting

object-unit.__helperText: Measurement unit (single numerology RX array carriers only)

rx-array-carrier.__helperText: Reference to RX array carrier configuration

period.__helperText: Measurement period in slots (aligned to even radio frames)

bin-count.__helperText: Number of frequency bins (must be < max-bin-count)

lower-bound.__helperText: Lower limit of first frequency bin

upper-bound.__helperText: Upper limit of last frequency bin

object-unit-id.__helperText: RX array carrier reference (single numerology only)

udp-echo.__helperText: UDP echo server configuration and status

dscp-config.__helperText: DSCP handling configuration for echo replies

number-of-calibration-symbols-per-block-.__helperText: DL symbols required per calibration block

number-of-calibration-blocks-per-step-ul.__helperText: UL blocks required per calibration step

number-of-calibration-steps.__helperText: Total steps required for full calibration

coordinated-ant-calib-prep-timer.__helperText: Minimum notification lead time (60s default for legacy support)

antenna-calibration-time-resource-index.__helperText: Unique index for calibration resource sets

little-endian-supported.__helperText: Supports little-endian byte order (big-endian always supported)

se6-rb-bit-supported.__helperText: Supports 'rb' bit usage with rbgsize=0 (CUS-Plane SE6)

number-of-guard-rbs-ul.__helperText: only numbers allowed and 2 to 8 characters.

number-of-guard-rbs-dl.__helperText: only numbers allowed and 2 to 8 characters.

max-num-tx-eaxc-id-groups.__helperText: only numbers allowed and 2 to 8 characters.

max-num-tx-eaxc-ids-per-group.__helperText: only numbers allowed and 2 to 8 characters.

max-num-rx-eaxc-id-groups.__helperText: only numbers allowed and 2 to 8 characters.

max-num-rx-eaxc-ids-per-group.__helperText: only numbers allowed and 2 to 8 characters.

dynamic-transport-delay-management-suppo.__helperText: Indicates if unit supports dynamic transport delay management through eCPRI Msg 5

support-only-unique-ecpri-seqid-per-eaxc.__displayname: Support Only Unique eCPRI SeqID Per eAxC
support-only-unique-ecpri-seqid-per-eaxc.__helperText: Indicates if O-RU expects unique eCPRI sequence ID for UL and DL eAxC_IDs for the same Component Carrier. If TRUE, O-DU must ensure uniqueness either by using different eAxC_IDs or sequence IDs per direction. Note: May cause incompatibilities with O-DUs designed for O-RAN CUS-Plane v02.00.

ext-ant-delay-capability.__helperText: Specifies how external antenna delay configuration is supported by the O-RU.

sub-band-frequency-ranges.__helperText: Frequency information on a per sub-band basis

sub-band.__helperText: Sub band when operating on band 46

max-supported-frequency-dl.__helperText: Maximum supported downlink frequency in Hz

min-supported-frequency-dl.__helperText: Minimum supported downlink frequency in Hz

number-of-laa-scarriers.__helperText: Indicates how many LAA secondary carriers are supported by the O-RU

maximum-laa-buffer-size.__helperText: Maximum buffer size per Component Carrier in Kilobytes

maximum-processing-time.__helperText: Maximum O-RU processing time for data handling

self-configure.__helperText: Indicates if the O-RU can manage the contention window locally

max-supported-bandwidth-dl.__helperText: Maximum total downlink bandwidth in module

max-supported-bandwidth-ul.__helperText: Maximum total uplink bandwidth in module

max-num-component-carriers.__helperText: Maximum number of component carriers supported by the O-RU (DL + UL)

max-num-bands.__helperText: Maximum number of bands supported by the O-RU (deprecated, moved to ru-capabilities)

max-num-sectors.__helperText: Maximum number of sectors supported by the O-RU

min-power-per-antenna.__helperText: Minimum power per band per antenna (deprecated; use min-gain/max-gain from CUS-Plane clause 8.1.3.3)
